Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After leaving Gray Raven, Ishmael walks alone toward the control room.'}
{3: 'She runs into Hetero-Creatures now and then, but the creatures just wander past Ishmael like she is not there.'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct walks calmly past the Hetero-Creatures toward the control room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: 'As soon as she enters the control room, Ishmael feels something off about it.'}
{3: 'The filing cabinets that should have been there are gone, replaced by a weird, open space.'}
{3: 'The air in that spot is twisting and warping, and a Hetero-Creature unlike any she has seen stands in the middle of the room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'A Hetero-Creature... no, a Surge Mimicry.', 4: '1', 18: '100006346'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You don't belong in this time.", 4: '1', 18: '100006347'}
{3: 'Ishmael looks at a chair beside her.'}
{3: 'She takes a step forward, and the chair looks like it has fallen over from another perspective.'}
{3: 'But looking closer, the chair is still firmly standing on the ground.'}
{3: 'Ishmael holds her hand out, waving gently.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Not just time, but space too.', 4: '1', 18: '100006349'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Taking another step, she feels like she is walking through thick slime.'}
{3: 'The control room looks like it is covered in the Red Tide, but it also seems to be just an illusion.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The Hetero-Creatures outside did get in through other entrances.', 4: '1', 18: '100006350'}
{3: 'This is where it all started—the "Dark Room" defense system got infected here.'}
{3: 'But why did this place get infected?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The "Dark Room" is under attack by Hetero-Creatures, but Gray Raven can handle it.', 4: '1', 18: '100006352'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What was supposed to happen here was "Gray Raven completing their mission by defeating the Hetero-Creatures with the residents of this base".', 4: '1', 18: '100006353'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "This control room shouldn't have been infected.", 4: '1', 18: '100006354'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Something strange must've happened...", 4: '1', 18: '100006355'}
{3: 'She ignores the Surge Mimicry, staring at the space in front of her, but her gaze seems to go past it.'}
{3: 'Her eyes land on the distant...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Her eyes land on the distant ▊▊▆▎▂▌▁▄▊▆▄'}
{3: '<size=50>distant</size>'}
{3: 'Ishmael looks down, fiddling with the dice in her hand.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "No, that narration won't do. It's not the right time yet.", 4: '1', 18: '100006356'}
{3: 'She stares off into the distance, gazing for a long while.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "...It's not the right time yet.", 4: '1', 18: '100006357'}
{3: 'Ishmael puts the dice away, her gaze cutting through the control room.'}
{3: 'She squints as if seeing something interesting.'}
{3: 'The Surge Mimicry wails and slowly fades away. Something outside time seems to be stopping it from being there.'}
{3: 'The "displacement" in the control room starts to dissipate.'}
{3: 'Ishmael steps forward, like her next step will take her to another world.'}
{3: 'Clack—'}
{3: "But then, something on the floor catches Ishmael's eye."}
{3: '—A wooden 20-sided die.'}
{3: 'Apparently, she has not put the die away properly.'}
{3: 'The die has fallen onto the ground with the number 20 facing up.'}
{3: 'Ishmael gives up her plan and steps back.'}
{3: 'She moves to the side, quietly watching the Punishing Virus in the control room disappear.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Thought I'd run into you here.", 4: '1', 18: '100006361'}
{3: 'She gives a knowing smile.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What\'s happening here is still "Gray Raven completing their mission by defeating the Hetero-Creatures with the residents of this base".', 4: '1', 18: '100006363'}
{3: '—Everything is as it should be.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory343.jpg'}
{1: 'Emergency Stairwell'}
{3: 'Emergency Stairwell'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Can you hear me, Gray Raven Commandant?', 18: '100006364'}
{3: 'A familiar voice suddenly comes through the comms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It's me. I've taken over the control room and removed the comms interference.", 5: '18', 18: '100006365'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'll be patching Lee and the base leader into the comms channel.", 5: '18', 18: '100006366'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I\'m in full control of the "Dark Room" defense system now.', 5: '18', 18: '100006367'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'll seal off most of the Hetero-Creatures and point you to the right path.", 5: '18', 18: '100006368'}
{2: "That'll be a big help!", 3: '125', 4: 'Thanks!', 5: '125'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: 'The large display before Ishmael has split into multiple smaller screens, showing surveillance feeds from various locations.'}
{3: 'She can see 【kuroname】 moving down, and Lee leading the residents fighting back on B19.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Working with "Gray Raven" again... It\'s bringing back old memories...', 4: '1', 18: '100006369'}
{3: 'She hits the broadcast button and makes an announcement to everyone in the base.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: "This is Ishmael. I'll be providing remote support from now on.", 18: '100006370'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "【kuroname】, I've sent the best route through to your terminal.", 5: '1', 18: '100006371'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "There's a large number of Hetero-Creatures in the emergency stairwell between B13 and B14. I've blocked them off with barrier walls.", 5: '1', 18: '100006372'}
{2: 'Understood.', 3: '139'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory343.jpg'}
{3: "With Ishmael's info, you, Lee, and Hutu work together to get the evacuees out as fast as you can."}
{3: "Ishmael's voice cuts through the static on the comms now and then."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The Type-52 light machine guns in corridor D5 on B19 are active.', 4: '18', 18: '100006373'}
{3: 'Even with her hushed voice, her odd comment has not gone unheard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Of course, I've been a fan of the famous Gray Raven for a long time...", 5: '18', 18: '100006375'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Alright, I've marked the armory in Zone A on B19. You can go there to resupply.", 5: '18', 18: '100006376'}
{3: 'Ishmael changes the subject, marking a new spot on your terminal. Putting your questions aside temporarily, you signal Lee to lead the evacuees to the armory for weapons.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: 'Seeing 【kuroname】 on the screen, she smiles a little.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Let's work together, just like old times.", 5: '1', 18: '100006377'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{1: 'Control Room', 2: 'Five hours later'}
{3: 'Five hours later, Control Room'}
{3: 'After five hours of watching the monitors, Ishmael calmly presses the last button, sealing off the Hetero-Creatures that Lee and Lucia have pushed back.'}
{3: 'All threats along the evacuation route are eliminated, and the rest are locked behind impenetrable barriers.'}
{3: 'The screen shows the team on the first floor.'}
{3: "Gray Raven's mission is halfway done. All that remains is moving these 4000-plus people to the conservation area."}
{3: 'Ishmael turns away from the monitors, stands up, and walks to a corner of the control room.'}
{3: 'The wall there recedes inward, slides aside, and reveals an elevator.'}
{3: 'She steps inside, pressing the button for B21.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{3: 'A moment later, the elevator doors open, and Ishmael steps into the small room ahead.'}
{3: 'Motion sensor lights activate as Ishmael walks in. The room is hardly "spacious"—there is only a row of filing cabinets and a large computer glowing blue.'}
{3: 'It is like walking into a strange, little library.'}
{3: 'Ishmael walks to one of the cabinets and pulls out a box. There is only a vacuum-sealed disc inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Mission accomplished.', 4: '1', 18: '100006378'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory702.jpg'}
{1: 'Target Conservation Area', 2: 'Three days later, late at night'}
{3: 'Three days later, late at night. Target conservation area.'}
{3: 'Gray Raven has successfully led the "Dark Room" residents to the conservation area.'}
{3: '47 people died during the battle and the escape. Hutu held a small funeral for them.'}
{3: 'Regardless, it is all over now.'}
{3: 'Ishmael sits in a corner of the conservation area, quietly watching as you talk to Hutu and the conservation area supervisor.'}
{3: 'A young person runs up to the conservation area supervisor with a folder. After a brief exchange, the two of them step away, leaving Hutu and you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hutu', 3: 'I must thank you for this. Gray Raven definitely lives up to their name.', 4: '1', 18: '100006379'}
{2: "It's what we do.", 3: '200'}
{3: 'Ishmael would notice how you hesitate briefly before asking Hutu a question.'}
{3: 'Hutu visibly tenses up afterward.'}
{3: 'Your conversation ends shortly after. Hutu leaves with his head down, looking somewhat shameful.'}
{3: 'As Hutu walks away, Ishmael comes over.'}
{2: 'Thank you for your help this time.', 3: '209'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I just did what I had to.', 4: '1', 18: '100006381'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What were you two talking about?', 4: '1', 18: '100006382'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Is it something you'd rather not say? If so, you don't have to answer.", 4: '1', 18: '100006383'}
{2: "It's fine. It's not a secret.", 3: '216'}
{2: "I asked him why he didn't have Lee send the message.", 3: '217'}
{2: "Lee could've handled it on his own.", 3: '218'}
{3: 'Ishmael gives a knowing grin.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Because he doesn't trust Babylonia?", 4: '1', 18: '100006384'}
{2: "He was afraid Lee wouldn't come back.", 3: '223'}
{2: "He figured Gray Raven wouldn't abandon them if Lee stayed.", 3: '224'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct frowns, looking a bit confused.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Why was he so set on risking a move to the conservation area?', 4: '1', 18: '100006385'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I inspected the whole "Dark Room" while I was in the control room—there were still tons of supplies inside.', 4: '1', 18: '100006386'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'After we got rid of the Hetero-Creatures, they could have lived there for another ten years, however high the Punishing Virus level is outside.', 4: '1', 18: '100006387'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Ten years... Isn't that good enough?", 4: '1', 18: '100006388'}
{2: "It's about hope.", 3: '232'}
{2: 'They have hope for the future, so they refuse to stay in a tomb.', 3: '234'}
{3: 'Ishmael thinks about that word over and over.'}
{3: 'It feels like forever since she had "hope", but how long has it been?'}
{3: 'She has been on a long journey, so long that her memories are a bit blurry.'}
{3: 'Does she, as she is now, still hold onto "hope"?'}
{3: 'Time changes a lot, but some things leave a mark, like that die...'}
{3: 'She calls out to you, who is about to leave.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I have something I want to give you.', 4: '1', 18: '100006392'}
{3: 'Ishmael pulls out a wooden 20-sided die from her pocket and hands it to you.'}
{3: 'Seeing the die in your hand, Ishmael seems momentarily taken aback.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Keep going. Don't stop, just keep going.", 4: '1', 18: '100006394'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That's what the person who gave me this die used to say.", 4: '1', 18: '100006395'}
{3: 'The conservation area supervisor comes over. It seems that they have sorted things out.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It appears that you are needed.', 4: '1', 18: '100006397'}
{3: 'Ishmael smiles and says goodbye before walking into the crowd.'}
{3: 'She sees a little girl asking a guitar player to teach her, and he smiles and agrees.'}
{3: 'Watching the crowd, she listens to the sound of guitar swell again.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V300cibeizhe/V300_01_02.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V300cibeizhe/V300_01_02.jpg'}
{3: 'The twilight disappears from her view, and the cold, snowy wind hits her face again.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'They have hope for the future, so they refuse to stay in a tomb...', 18: '100006398'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_05.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{3: "The singer's voice echoes in her ears as Ishmael tightens her cloak and watches the bonfire dance."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Can you still bring them hope this time?', 18: '100006399'}
